Create a page with fluid layout

Source: R/page.R
page_fluid.Rd

Alias for shiny::fluidPage() with theme defaulting to bslib's recommended version Bootstrap.

page_fluid(..., title = NULL, theme = bs_theme(), lang = NULL)

Arguments

...

Elements to include within the page
title

The browser window title (defaults to the host URL of the page). Can also be set as a side effect of the titlePanel() function.
theme

Alternative Bootstrap stylesheet (normally a css file within the www directory). For example, to use the theme located at www/bootstrap.css you would use theme = "bootstrap.css".
lang

ISO 639-1 language code for the HTML page, such as "en" or "ko". This will be used as the lang in the <html> tag, as in <html lang="en">. The default (NULL) results in an empty string.

Contents

bslib is an R package developed by RStudio
